name: Elias Merhy
quote:
I had the pleasure of having Danial on my team for nearly a year, and during that time, I witnessed an impressive professional evolution. Danial started as a brilliant Al/ML expert, quickly grew into a capable Al and backend engineer, and ultimately became a well rounded Al and full stack engineer.

Danial possesses very sharp technical knowledge and expertise in AI/ML and backend technologies. What truly sets him apart is his readiness to take on any challenge, his curiosity to learn, and his determination to master new domains, including frontend development, where he made remarkable progress in a short time.

He is punctual, effective, and upfront, always addressing discussions directly and constructively. Danial's calm and thoughtful approach allows him to step back, understand a project's full context, and then propose the most suitable solution. His positive attitude, teamwork, and openness to feedback make him a pleasure to work with.

Danial has impressive documentation skills and has strong interest in technology in general. He combines tenacity with wisdom and a continuous drive for excellence. Danial is definitely an asset to any organization he joins.
worked_with_at: Samsung Design Innovation Center (Samsung Electronics France)

name: Victor Charpentier
quote:
I had the pleasure of working with Danial for a year at Samsung Electronics France, where he was the group’s Machine Learning expert. Collaborating with him was always a rewarding experience.

Beyond his deep technical mastery, Danial brings a strong sense of collective purpose to every project. He has a natural ability to create alignment within a team — clarifying priorities, helping everyone see the bigger picture, and ensuring that technical decisions serve broader strategic goals.

Working with Danial always felt fluid and productive. He knows how to balance rigor and efficiency, and his calm, thoughtful approach fosters both trust and creativity. His capacity to guide discussions, integrate different perspectives, and move the team forward with clarity makes him an excellent colleague and a natural team leader.
